name: Hamborger
description: Our classic hamborger. A layer of beef goodness topped with pickles, tomato, mustard, mayonnaise and cheese.

name: Double Hamborger
description: Our classic hamborger, doubled. Two layers of juicy beef topped with pickles, mustard, mayonnaise and cheese.

name: Spicy Hamborger
description: A new take on the old classic. A hamborger, with spice.

name: Kentucky Fried Borger
description: We didn't rip this burger off from anywhere. Promise.

name: Fillet O Fush
description: A beautiful, hand-caught fush wrapped in a briosh bun. WARNING: May take up to 2 days to catch fush.

name: Full Chicken
description: A lovely stuffed chicken that was recently bought from the supermarket.

name: Half-eaten Chicken Nooget
description: Hey don't look at us, what you see is what you get.

name: Kimchi Froies
description: Our parents wanted to put their old Kimchi somewhere. They accidentally dumped it into our fries. Surprise.

name: Thicc Shake
description: When the protein shake ain't giving you the gainz.

name: Bacon & Egg McMoofin
description: Crispy bacon with a beautifully cooked egg. Perfect way to start a cholestrol ridden day.

name: 3 Pancakes
description: White, fluffy pancakes with golden maple syrup.

name: Coca-Cola
description: A true American creation. 375mL of cold, refreshing Coca-Cola.

name: Pepsi
description: For the people who like the inferior brand of Coke. 375mL of cold, bland Pepsi.
